item.title: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的巨型火箭在周四的另一次试飞中升空，比前两次试飞飞得更远，但飞船在返回地球的过程中失去了踪迹。
item.description:
SpaceX’s mega rocket blasted off on another test flight Thursday and made it farther than two previous attempts, but the spacecraft was lost as it descended back to Earth.https://t.co/BRqZoaM0jh pic.twitter.com/6PnJGMAgy1

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 路德-"卢克大叔"-坎贝尔（Luther "Uncle Luke" Campbell）说，Freaknik 应被视为黑人历史。Hulu 将推出一部关于该活动的纪录片，1983 年至 1999 年期间，该活动在亚特兰大举办了一场规模庞大的街头派对。
item.description:
Luther "Uncle Luke" Campbell says Freaknik should be considered Black history.

Hulu is releasing a documentary on the event, which was a sprawling street party throughout Atlanta from 1983 to 1999. pic.twitter.com/p5OQiCkqNf

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 14, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四将在佛罗里达州举行听证会，法官将就是否驳回针对他的机密文件案听取辩论。这是特朗普面临的四项刑事起诉之一：
item.description:
Donald Trump has a hearing Thursday in Florida where a judge will hear arguments on whether to dismiss the classified documents case against him.

That's one of the four criminal indictments Trump faces.

You can track all of the cases here: https://t.co/lk2IQpODsJ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 小拇指和大拇指伸直，其余手指向下弯曲：这就是夏威夷的 "夏卡 "手势。议会中的两项法案将使 "夏卡 "成为夏威夷的官方手势。
item.description:
A pinky and thumb extended with the remaining fingers curled down: That’s the “shaka” in Hawaii. A pair of bills in the Legislature would make the shaka Hawaii's official gesture. pic.twitter.com/zmb7FyVDkB

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.description:
